ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class RequesterFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RequesterFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class RequesterFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    RequesterFragment displays the lists of task that a task requester needs to see this Fragment is displayed by MainActivity
    See Also:
    MainActivity

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RequesterFragment.AssignedListFragment
      AssignedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and have been assigned to a provider
      static class  RequesterFragment.ClosedListFragment
      ClosedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and have been finished
      static class  RequesterFragment.RequestedListFragment
      RequestedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and may or may not have been bidded on

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

        android.support.v4.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.support.v4.app.Fragment.SavedState
